response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a rate that reflects its true worth while also providing you with substantial savings compared to its market value of $1,500,000. We are confident that this investment will pay dividends in terms of efficiency, growth, and profitability for your organization. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
